Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A small, sturdily-built hunting dog, with a coat of dense, hard white fur, marked with patches of brown and black on his head and back. He is twenty-one inches tall, and looks to weigh about forty pounds. {?when| $(this.woundlevel) | 1 | Upon closer inspection you realize that he is bruised here and there, indicating he has been beaten. | 2 | Over his body, you see several deep bruisemarks indicating he has been through quite the beating. | 3 | He is in quite bad shape. Lumps of blood hang loosely from his fur, deep bruises cover his body.} {? range | $(actor.skill:healer) | 4 | 11 | {? range | $(this.woundcount) | 2000 | 4000 | It will take at least a day or two before this wound gets any better. | {? range | $(this.woundcount) | 1500 | 2001 | The wound will take at least a day to get any better. | {? range | $(this.woundcount) | 1000 | 1501 | The wound is starting to get better, but it will still be about a day before any noticeable change occurs. | {? range | $(this.woundcount) | 500 | 1001 | The wound is definitely getting better, and will probably improve visibly in a couple of hours to a day. | {? range | $(this.woundcount) | 0 | 501 | The wound will get better in a few hours. }}}}}}

A small, sturdily-built hunting dog{?when| $(this.woundlevel) | 1 | . There are a few bruise-marks visible, indicating he has been hurt recently. | 2 | . Several deep bruises are seen on his body, with dry lumps of blood hanging from his fur coat. | 3 | , barely alive, with deep, gaping wounds all over his body. | * | .}
A small hound's soft, sensitive belly, covered in very fine white fur.
A small hound's strong, compact body, with a deep chest, well sprung ribs, and muscular hindquarters.
A small hound's hindquarters, with energetic legs and a long tail.
A small hound's sharp, curved nails.
A small hound's large, floppy ear.
A small hound's pair of large, floppy ears.
A small hound's alert, dark brown eye.
A small hound's glossy, communicative eyebrow.
A small hound's pair of glossy, communicative eyebrows.
A small hound's pair of alert dark brown eyes.
The small hound's face, upon which are placed a distinct muzzle, black nose, a bold forehead and hanging down its sides are large floppy ears.
The small hound has a coat of glossy white fur, with brown, dark brown, and black patches on his body and head.
The small hound's head is proportional to its body, with a distinct muzzle, black nose, bold forehead and large floppy ears.
The small hound's straight, tireless leg.
The small hound's sturdy legs are straight and seem full of energy.
A small hound's mouth, with a pink tongue and canine teeth.
A small hound's long neck, covered in short, smooth fur.
A small hound's inquisitive, cold nose.
The paw is round and catlike, with toes set close together turning slightly inwards, tipped with short, sharp claws.
The small hound's paws are round and catlike, with toes set close together turning slightly inwards. The pads are thick, well developed and strong.
The small hound's long and upwardly curved tail, covered with brown fur at the base and ending in white, with a brush on the underside.
A small hound's sharp, serviceable set of canine teeth.
A small hound's warm, wet, pink tongue.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "E[G]\\n/*\\n * D=Note someone leaving.\\n */\\nif (\$actor.\\"nip:group\\" == \\"cat\\" \&\& !random(2)) \{\\n \$delay(1 + random(3), TRUE, \\"abcd\\");\\n Social(this, oneof(\\"bark\\", \\"whine\\", \\"howl\\", \\"growl\\"), oneof(\\"happily\\", \\"excitedly\\", \\"instinctively\\", \\"instinctually\\", \\"ecstatically\\", \\"eagerly\\"), nil, \\"at\\", \$target);\\n \$delay(1 + random(3), TRUE, \\"bcde\\");\\n ::core_movement_exit();\\n\}\\nreturn TRUE;\\n"

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: A male Harrier based on Elmer from Marrach.
